title: Replace site header logo with newly uploaded image

requirements.text: Replace the site header logo with the newly uploaded image file "Logo HD round cropped-1.jpeg" by generating an optimized, round-cropped, transparent PNG logo asset at 512x512 under "frontend/public/assets/generated" and ensuring the header uses that asset at "/assets/generated/school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png".

quotes: change the logo with the given picture

acceptanceCriteria: A new optimized logo image exists at "frontend/public/assets/generated/school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png" (512x512, transparent background, round-cropped).
The site header renders the updated logo using src="/assets/generated/school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png" and it is visible on both desktop and mobile navigation.
No backend changes are required for this logo replacement.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify files listed as immutable paths in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Serve the logo as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated; do not route the logo through the backend.
nonGoals: Changing any other site branding, theme colors, typography, or layout beyond the logo asset replacement.
Adding admin/CMS controls for logo upload or editing.

required: Optimized round-cropped school logo with transparent background (school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png, 512x512)
